content: ग्राह {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ही|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [ग्रह् भावे घञ्] Seizing, clutching; taking, holding, receiving &c. --हः {@--1@} Seizing, grasping. {@--2@} A crocodile, shark; रागग्र हवती <ls>Bh. 3. 45.</ls> {@--3@} A prisoner. {@--4@} Accepting. {@--5@} Understanding, knowledge. {@--6@} Persistence, importunity. {@--7@} Determination, resolve; <ls>Bg. 17. 19.</ls> {@--8@} A disease. {@--9@} Any large fish or marine animal. {@--10@} Morbid affection, disease. {@--11@} Beginning, undertaking. --ही A female crocodile.
ग्राहं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Taking, seizing; बदिग्राह गृहीता <ls>V. 1.</ls>
